news_header: Elcoline acquires TSG business from Fortum, expanding its operations in the energy sector.
news_text: Established in 2002, Elcoline is set to finalize its acquisition of TSG business from Fortum by the end of the year. This move aims to internationalize and expand Elcoline's operations in key industries, particularly in energy. Following the acquisition, Elcoline will employ nearly 1,000 people across Finland, Sweden, and Germany. Fortum is divesting from non-core businesses, while Elcoline continues to enhance its service offerings in maintenance and installation. TSG, a Nordic service provider, specializes in turbine and generator maintenance and had a net sales of EUR 32 million last year. The deal's completion is contingent upon meeting specific conditions, and the purchase price remains undisclosed.
